theDuelist:SummonersChallenge.NAME: Summoning Zones
theDuelist:SummonersChallenge.DESCRIPTION: During battle you may only play monsters that summon if you have empty summoning slots.

theDuelist:MaxSummonChallenge.NAME: Increment Randomizer
theDuelist:MaxSummonChallenge.DESCRIPTION: You will have a chance to fail Increment actions.

theDuelist:SummonRandomizer.NAME: Summon Randomizer
theDuelist:SummonRandomizer.DESCRIPTION: You will have a chance to fail Summon actions.

theDuelist:TributeRandomizer.NAME: Tribute Randomizer
theDuelist:TributeRandomizer.DESCRIPTION: You will have a chance to fail Tribute actions.
